description: IN served - You have failed to ensure that employees exposure to substances hazardous to health, namely welding fume created by TIG welding of Stainless Steel is prevented or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled because you have not provided Local Exhaust Ventilation to extract welding fume from the work area.
